title: Pessat 2023
content: For all who have given pessat till now, how was it and what was the level of the paper?

comments.body: It was harder than JEE mains, but easier than advanced. Time is a huge constraint.  Good luck

Hey how was the exam?
Math hard tha for the given time. Chemistry aur English easy tha. Physics moderate tha, just like decent kcet papers. But math felt damn lengthy.

Hey bro, what was the exam patter? Different sources on google have different patterns.. can you please tell me what the pattern of the exam was

180 marks 180 mins, no negatives, subjects math physics and English. Question types we're pretty random, kahi question numericals the, kahi mcq, kahi answer using a virtual keyboard (one word). Kafi random tha. My advice don't expect anything and be prepared for the worst
Thanks brother, so every question was worth 1 mark?
